projects.title: Backend for Collaborative Academic Repository
projects.description: Project in development: backend for a collaborative repository of academic articles, built in TypeScript with Node.js, Express, and PostgreSQL. Implements JWT authentication with refresh tokens and HTTP-only cookies, role-based access control (RBAC), and Swagger/OpenAPI documentation.

projects.title: RioLeufu Hotel
projects.description: Responsive frontend application for Hotel, built with React.js and Tailwind CSS, with an translation feature using i18next library.

projects.title: Geekhub Marketplace
projects.description: A Fullstack App for a Marketplace with shopping cart, built with React.js for a responsive front-end and Node.js, Express.js, and PostgreSQL for the back-end. The project follows the MVC design pattern for clean and maintainable code.

projects.title: Pizza Restaurant Frontend
projects.description: Frontend application  for a Pizza restaurant, including a shopping cart, built with React.Js and Bootstrap.

projects.title: Cocktail Finder
projects.description: Frontend application built with React that consumes the cocktaildb.com API, featuring a search tool to find cocktails based on selected ingredients.
